mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into Member(id,password,name,address,tel,email,member_type) values( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N' )
